message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1200000. I understand its significance and would like to extend an offer to you at a special price. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for $950000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable item at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession.
